SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.controller

Class BackgroundManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.controller.BackgroundManager
public class BackgroundManager extends Object
The BackgroundManager class is a singleton that manages the background colour and image of the game.

This class will listen for any changes of the background colour and updates it to ensure a consistent background colour across all game screens.

The default background colour is white.

See Also:

  • Property Details

    • backgroundColor

      public javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<javafx.scene.paint.Color> backgroundColorProperty
      A property representing the background colour of the game.

      Holds a Color value representing the background colour of the game's UI.

      It is initialized to Color with WHITE colour as the default colour

      See Also:

      • setBackgroundColor(Color)
      • backgroundColorProperty()

  • Constructor Details

    • BackgroundManager

      private BackgroundManager()
      This private constructor ensures that the BackgroundManager class follows the Singleton Design Pattern, where only one instance of the class can be created throughout the whole runtime of a game.

      The instance is retrieved through the getInstance() method.

      See Also:
      • getInstance()

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static BackgroundManager getInstance()
      This method ensures only one singleton exists, following the Singleton Design Pattern.

      If it detects that no singleton of instance exist, it will create a new instance.

      Returns:
      The singleton instance of BackgroundManager
